bibl.title: From Posidippus to Palladas: What have Literary Papyri done for us?
bibl.note: Discusses the progress made between 2001 and 2013 in the field of Greek literary texts, especially epigrams, from the early Ptolemaic period to the late Roman period. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.seg: Peter van Minnen, From Posidippus to Palladas: What have Literary Papyri done for us?
Papyrology AD 2013. 27th International Congress of Papyrology. Keynote Papers = JJurP 43 (2013) pp. 243-261; - 441.
Discusses the progress made between 2001 and 2013 in the field of Greek literary texts, especially epigrams, from the early Ptolemaic period to the late Roman period. - Avec résumé en anglais.
